name: A Simple Request
description: What's wrong with a simple Cardassian CMO doing a little experimentation when faced with the fissures and the probabilities they bring. Garak certainly hopes you'll join him for some simple research - and not worry about what it may be for!
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Fissure Quest T'Pol, any version of Garak, Bashir, Neelix, STT Originals, Displaced, Temporal Agents, or Mirror Universe crew will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Fissure Quest T'Pol, Garak, Bashir, Neelix, STT Originals, Displaced, Temporal Agents, Mirror Universe
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Archer
featured_crew.flavor: The Enterprise shuttle arrives on Earth, but Archer finds himself not at headquarters, but in the thick of World War II.

action.name: We're Not Quite Home Yet, But It's Good To Be Back

featured_crew.name: Bashir
featured_crew.flavor: In a multiverse of possibilities, an EMH version of Bashir married to Garak isn’t a surprise. Which universe they choose to live in might be.

action.name: What? Then Why Have We Been Arguing?

featured_crew.name: Neelix
featured_crew.flavor: The Maitre de was less than successful in his attempts to enforce the dress code when the Borg pursued Picard into his nightclub.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Archer
rewards.flavor: The Enterprise shuttle arrives on Earth, but Archer finds himself not at headquarters, but in the thick of World War II.

action.name: We're Not Quite Home Yet, But It's Good To Be Back

rewards.name: Neelix
rewards.flavor: The Maitre de was less than successful in his attempts to enforce the dress code when the Borg pursued Picard into his nightclub.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

adventures.name: Gelatinous Guesswork
adventures.description: Test out different decon gels after going through fissures.

adventures.name: Vital Signs
adventures.description: Review biodata of subjects who have gone through fissures.

adventures.name: Molecular Misalignment
adventures.description: Use the medical transporter while going through fissures.

rewards.name: A Simple Request
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

adventures.name: Two Places at a Time
adventures.description: Gather data on fissures that have opened.

adventures.name: Vital Signs
adventures.description: Review biodata of subjects who have gone through fissures.

adventures.name: Who is Who?
adventures.description: Find ways of identifying individuals from fissure universes.

rewards.name: A Simple Request
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Neelix
rewards.flavor: The Maitre de was less than successful in his attempts to enforce the dress code when the Borg pursued Picard into his nightclub.

rewards.name: Bashir
rewards.flavor: In a multiverse of possibilities, an EMH version of Bashir married to Garak isn’t a surprise. Which universe they choose to live in might be.

action.name: What? Then Why Have We Been Arguing?

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Get results at all costs with the Cardassians.

potential_rewards.name: Cardassian Union Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Cardassian faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Profit off the possibility with the Ferengi Alliance.

potential_rewards.name: Ferengi Alliance Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Alliance faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Find out the truth with the Klingon Empire.

potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Hello, Captain, good of you to answer my hails. I'll get right down to business. I'm looking for some of the brightest minds and boldest hearts in Starfleet to assist with a little experiment of mine. Nothing too difficult, really, although it will require some time and travel."

"Garak, I've already told you, you can't be that vague, especially with the risks involved in the experiments you're running. Captain, these experiments will require an expert hand, but they are quite dangerous. We know so little about the fissures and their effects."

"Which is why we're running these experiments. There is no reward without risk, especially when traveling the stars. So what do you say, Captain? Think you could help a doctor out with his simple request?"

"I share Doctor Bashir's trepidation. If these truly are 'simple' experiments, I believe Doctor Garak would be more forthcoming. Still, I believe the expertise of your crew could prove quite useful - and your ethical oversight may ensure these experiments conclude safely."

"Hello, Captain, good of you to answer my hails. I'll get right down to business. I'm looking for some of the brightest minds and boldest hearts in Starfleet to assist with a little experiment of mine. Nothing too difficult, really, although it will require some time and travel."

"Garak, I've already told you, you can't be that vague, especially with the risks involved in the experiments you're running. Captain, these experiments will require an expert hand, but they are quite dangerous. We know so little about the fissures and their effects."

"Which is why we're running these experiments. There is no reward without risk, especially when traveling the stars. So what do you say, Captain? Think you could help a doctor out with his simple request?"

"I share Doctor Bashir's trepidation. If these truly are 'simple' experiments, I believe Doctor Garak would be more forthcoming. Still, I believe the expertise of your crew could prove quite useful - and your ethical oversight may ensure these experiments conclude safely."
